======
slidoc
======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/slidoc.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/slidoc

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/marskar/slidoc.svg

.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/marskar/slidoc/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/marskar/slidoc/

Use Python to make HTML slides via Pandoc.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://slidoc.readthedocs.io.
